name: Sleepy Joe
description:
Welcome to sleepy joe. A little top down shooter for Trijam #120: The 3 hour game jam where you guide Joe from his coffee break to his desk as fast as possible. But be careful he will get tired again quickly. Collect beans to keep him awake and drink something from the coffee machines.

The game is my/our very first self-developed game, which was created in collaboration with Sekto. Unfortunately, it was not created in the required time of 3 hours, but took almost 2 days, because we are both inexperienced game developers. 

We are looking forward to your comments if you liked the little game.
